data.name: Stage 3: Azaria
data.detailed_description:
After a royal meeting ended in betrayal and mass murder, Heorogan castle is under the siege of the powerful mage Eolica's Army and now it's up to you to defend the castle. Control Azaria, leader of the Sanctum order and the most powerful hybrid mage on the realm, as you become Hereogan Castle's last bastion of defense. bend elements to your will, unleash your power and blast your enemies as you explore the sorroundings of Heorogan's Castle.

Cast powerful elemental magic

Select between different magic elements and launch powerful spells. Use body gestures and motions in order to use them and even discover hidden spells!
The different array of spells and their uses lets you engage enemies in different ways depending on your playstyle!

Wield weapons and imbue them with magic

Aside from her magic, Azaria also wields a magic bow that can be influenced by your current magic, making its behavior and use change throughout the fights.
You can choose to fight the hordes with your bow and dexterity, or cause mayhem with icy arrows and fiery explosions!

First person shooter with smart AI enemies

Enemies will not stay still while you shoot and blow them away - they'll cover eachother, or aid their teammates in different ways in order to defeat you! other times, they'll spawn with predetermined strong formations which will make you take difficult and careful decisions if you want to defeat them.

Vitual reality mayhem!

Try to survive as hordes of enemies assault you - use your abilities to eliminate them one by one, or all of them at once!


Enjoy a full VR experience that will introduce you for the first time to the Stage 3's universe and it's characters.

data.short_description: Enter a Fantasy VR world in Stage 3 Azaria, an FPS where you control a powerful Archmage, who is the only survivor after a royal meeting that ended up in betrayal and mass murder. Use your power and blast your enemies as you protect Heorogan's castle from the siege of Eolica's army.

pc_requirements.minimum:
최소:
  • 64비트 프로세서와 운영 체제가 필요합니다
  • 운영체제: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • 프로세서: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • 메모리: 8 GB RAM
  • 그래픽: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: 버전 11
  • 저장공간: 5 GB 사용 가능 공간
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • 프로세서: Intel Core i7 6700k or AMD Ryzen5 1600X
  • 메모리: 16 MB RAM
  • 그래픽: GeForce GTX 1080
